```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

data %>%
  mutate(xgene = Sugar + Spice) %>%
  filter(Attribute = "Everything-Nice") %>%
  group_by(Location) %>%
  summarise(Meanness = mean(Ness))
```
